title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets           PETS at the Park "Woof!" "Woof, woof, bark!" "Sniff, sniff, squat." "Bark, sniff, woof!"   Translations: 1) "YES!" in response to the question, "Are dogs allowed in the park?" While they are allowed in the park, only certified help animals are allowed in park buildings. 2) "Please keep me safe!" A reminder from your canine companion to keep it in control and on a leash at all times during your visit. Dogs must be on a leash, their owners must be holding the other end. It's for your pet's protection! 3) "I can't flush!" Please be considerate of other visitors and clean up after your pet. Disposable waste pickup bags are available at a few park locations, with trash cans at or very near the bag dispensers. 4) "Oooh! New people to meet!" Your pet might want to meet others, but please remember that some people may be nervous around dogs.
